key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: allowed-keys
key.description: If non-empty, keybindings will be ignored unless their settings directory is in the list. This is useful for lockdown.

key.name: calculator
key.description: Binding to launch the calculator.

key.name: email
key.description: Binding to launch the email client.

key.name: eject
key.description: Binding to eject an optical disc.

key.name: help
key.description: Binding to launch the help browser.

key.name: home
key.description: Binding to open the Home folder.

key.name: media
key.description: Binding to launch the media player.

key.name: next
key.description: Binding to skip to next track.

key.name: pause
key.description: Binding to pause playback.

key.name: play
key.description: Binding to start playback (or toggle play/pause).

key.name: logout
key.description: Binding to log out.

key.name: previous
key.description: Binding to skip to previous track.

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: screensaver
key.description: Binding to lock the screen.

key.name: search
key.description: Binding to launch the search tool.

key.name: stop
key.description: Binding to stop playback.

key.name: volume-down
key.description: Binding to lower the system volume.

key.name: volume-mute
key.description: Binding to mute the system volume.

key.name: volume-up
key.description: Binding to raise the system volume.

key.name: www
key.description: Binding to launch the web browser.

key.name: magnifier
key.description: Binding to show the screen magnifier

key.name: screenreader
key.description: Binding to start the screen reader

key.name: on-screen-keyboard
key.description: Binding to show the on-screen keyboard

key.name: increase-text-size
key.description: Binding to increase the text size

key.name: decrease-text-size
key.description: Binding to decrease the text size

key.name: toggle-contrast
key.description: Binding to toggle the interface contrast

key.name: magnifier-zoom-in
key.description: Binding for the magnifier to zoom in

key.name: magnifier-zoom-out
key.description: Binding for the magnifier to zoom out
